features: 【Flexible Tripod】This mini baby stroller fan has a unique flexible tripod with a new version upgraded silicone surface, instead of plastic and sponge surface, which makes it waterproof, and avoid getting dirty, easy to clean, less prone to aging, and breakage, more durable, safe and health for you and your baby. You can bend any angle you want to set up various forms: stand as a desk fan, handheld as a mini portable fan, hanging or winding as a clip on fan, even as a phone holder.

【Versatile and Portable】 Since this portable mini fan is bendable and compact and lightweight, you can easily put it in your handbag or backpack. It will be your good companion in outdoor travel, cycling, hiking, climbing, camping, and other activities. You can also clip it on the stroller, bike, treadmill, crib, car seat. Let you feel cool in the hot summer, any time and any place.

【Quiet and Powerful】With one button to switch between 3 different wind speeds, you will find the perfect speed for you. Most importantly, the motor is very quiet, so you never have to worry about your baby being woken up and ensure your baby has a good sleep. The ultra-fine mesh design effectively prevents the baby from touching the fan blades to avoid injury. Sturdy and fall-resistant, non-toxic and odorless, safe for children to use.

【USB or Battery Powered】This rechargeable stroller fan has a built-in 2600mAh battery. It takes only 2.5 hours to fully charge and it can operate continuously for 2-8 hours (depending on different speeds). You can easily charge this mini fan with a USB Type-C cable.

【100% Guarantee】We promise that you and your baby will love our brand new stroller fan, which has a cute octopus design. Makes a great summer gift. Feel free to contact us with any questions to give you satisfactory after-sales service. If you are not completely satisfied, you can also return it using our risk-free money-back guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The hot summer is coming, hurry up and buy a portable fan for yourself, your baby, your family, or friends.

Why choose SNAWOWO among so many baby stroller fans? SNAWOWO baby stroller fans feature several new designs. Dense housing ensures safety. The gap is less than 6mm to prevent the baby's fingers or toes from entering the fan and getting hurt. So it is safe for children.The flexible tripod can be bent at any angle, so the fan can stand on its own, be handheld, or be securely strapped to any stand or pole. You can then use it not only as a stroller fan but also as a handheld fan, crib fan, desk fan, car seat fan, outdoor fan, etc.The tripod is all-silicone and integrated molding. It is soft, non-slip and so comfortable for you to handhold. Waterproof and dirt-resistant and easy to clean, healthy for babies. It is hard to be broken, so durable to use for many years.

Suitable for various application scenarios: Stroller Fan This mini fan is a must-have artifact for you to take your baby out with a stroller in summer. You can tie it firmly to the stroller and adjust the angle at will. Its optional 3 speeds can bring the baby a cool feeling and a happy mood. Crib Fan You can wrap this baby fan around the crib, adjust the angle and turn on the fan. It is recommended to set the minimum wind speed, which is soft and quiet, to give your baby a comfortable sleeping environment. Handheld Fan The fan is small in size and can be easily put in a shoulder bag, carried with you, and used at any time. It is also light, you will not feel its presence in your backpack, and you will not feel tired in your hand. It can accompany you at all times when you go to the park, go shopping, or take a walk.

Desk Fan This mini fan can stand stably on your desk. You can also adjust its height and angle as needed. It provides you with a comfortable and cool environment when you are working or playing games in hot weather. Car Seat Fan When you take your baby out in summer, your baby will feel very hot, but the air conditioning wind in the car is not suitable for your baby. This mini fan will be your ideal choice. It can be easily and stably installed in your car seat. Outdoor Fan Carry this mini fan with you when you go out for outdoor activities such as hiking and beach trips. It can be wrapped around any stand or hung on any object, such as a bicycle, parasol, etc. It immediately gives you a cool experience when you need it.

Specifications: Input: DC5V 0.8A(MAX)Power consumption: 3WBattery capacity: 2600mAhCharging duration: 3.5hoursWorking time: 3~8hoursSize: 11*4.3*3.2inchesWeight: 260g (0.57lb) Package list: 1 * Stroller Fan 1 * Built-in Battery 1 * USB Charging Cable 1 * User Manual Why do SNAWOWO stroller fans stand out? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this fan
reviews.reviewText: Works very well when hot. Very easy to use. when stroller is folded it stays on. Easy to store in diaper bag. Over all quality is great !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used this so much! It was perfect during labor when things got intense! And then it was perfect for my baby through the summer. Easily attaches to car seats, strollers, it stands on tables, anywhere you need it! The battery life is great! 3 settings for speed. This is a MUST HAVE for new parents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this mini fan for my toddler, keeps him cool. I wish it had more battery life

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to charge. Great size for diaper bag. Essential in Texas summer heat. Would buy again! And super cute color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mini fan if perfect for my baby stroller/car seat in the warm weather!! Product is exactly as pictured. The battery life is not the greatest but i like that it is charged instead of batteries. It has 3 different speeds and its not very loud. I do recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Legs snap off
reviews.reviewText: The legs snapped off of our fan! We were super disappointed because it is a great powerful fan. We live in the tropics and use it all the time. Bummer that it broke!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dog on plane
reviews.reviewText: I bought two different styles of fans when I was flying with my two pugs in August. This model won for the versatility of battery and positioning. When the plane takes off and lands you must unplug any power cords, so having a battery option is important because those seem to be the most stressful/hot times. The USB option is a great backup option to save battery life. I used one set of batteries for two flights from Seattle to KC and the battery still had a charge.I was trying out two different dog carriers and I was able to position this fan with ease on both carriers, which was helpful. The position I found most useful was hanging the fan off the net on the back of the seat but the arms made it easy to hang from the bag as well.The fan was a little noisy at home but was not an issue over the noise of the plane. The fan is not super tiny, but I was able to fit it in my carry-on bag, so overall worth it.If you are thinking about a dog carrier - I have a standard Delta TSA-approved carrier (the brindle pug is sitting in) and a Snoozer rolling backpack carrier. My pugs are 17 pounds. The Snoozer pug carrier has great visibility and front ventilation when under the seat and it is nice that you can roll it or wear it. I found it very easy to use a fan with this carrier. The Large fits under the window seat and larger middle seats toward the front of the plane on Alaska, but my guess is the medium fits under all seats. The Delta bag is terrible unless your dog likes being trapped in a cave lol. I shoved the fan inside the bag and was not worried about my dog hurting himself, the blades are well protected.Anyway, I hope this is useful for anyone traveling with pets. I am sure it works great for babies too haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I use this portable fan so much in the hot summer months. It will bend and adjust and attach to the arm of a lawn chair. My niece uses it on her stroller to keep her baby cool at sporting events. It is a great product to have on hand.
Doesn’t stay in one place if you are walking on a road that isn’t nicely paved. Great to use for yourself or to set up in the ground on hot days.

Es super fácil de usar, instalar y cargar. Tiene 3 velocidades y da el aire suficiente para refrescar. Yo lo uso para mi bebé en la carriola y en el car sean. Me hubiera gustado que se pueda mover la dirección del ventilador porque es fijo pero ajustando las patitas puedes dirigirlo a donde te acomode.

reviews.reviewTitle: Helps In A Car With No AC!
reviews.reviewText: I have an older car & the AC died in it. Frankly it’s not worth spending thousands on to repair/replace the AC & it’s insanely hot out so I thought, why not! I tried this fan & it does help. It’s a little crazy but it helps in the sweltering heat of 2023. I twisted it around one of the prongs on the passenger side headrest and aimed it at me & I have moving air! LOL hey you gotta do what you gotta do!

Works really well! 3 settings. Noisy, but having it on the second setting for 2 seconds gave me a chill and I’m hot all the time, so I think it’ll do well keeping my face cool while I straighten my hair and put on makeup! It wraps really easily without an sliding down the metal bar. I installed a bar beside my bathroom mirror for my hair clips and it’s a perfect spot to attach this little fan! Really happy with the purchase. Came precharged so I can use it right away. Just arrived today after ordering it this morning. The box arrived damaged so that wouldn’t have been good for a gift, but it was fine since it was just for my own use.
Acheté pour le camping parfait pour chasser les moustiques !!!
